text: Angrakip ah nangni ning-inchong theijei: inngamna ah, chongrilla, jetna-ah, ningsanzootna-ah halli keini ningnaminriangna khan nangni ning-inchong jei.8:7. keini ningnaminriangna; manuscripts lekkhat ah, nangni kinnaminriangna Khawa jarra hiwa minriang chuon hinnum malungkalok ning esik kinmanuom.
